ProductInfo.Features:
4 Channel real-time standalone DVR system, support SATA HD up to 2TB (hard drive NOT included), H.264 main profile.
Video Input/Output: BNC 4/BNC 1, Audio Input/Output: RCA 4/RCA 1. Two type video out: TV monitor BNC output and PC monitor VGA output. Support PTZ.
Display & recording frame rate: NTSC: 120f/s, PAL: 100f/s. Primary and secondary coding. Signal system: NTSC/PAL. Remote access: internet explorer or netviewer software.
Support remote view via smart phone & 3G mobile£ºiPhone, Google Android, Blackberry, Windows Mobile Pro 5.0 & 6.1, Symbian S60 3rd & S60 5th. 4CH alarm in, 1ch alarm out snapshot and recording.
Plug and play, no wiring, no router. Two USB interfaces.
ProductInfo.Name: Gadget Zone HI8704 4 CH Channel DVR H.264 Surveillance DVR Digital Video Recorder 3G Mobile Wired/Wireless Monitor P2P Support PTZ, Manual/Scheduled/Motion Detection 3 Record Mode, Support TCP/IP/PPPoE/DHCP/DDNS Net Protocol, VGA Video Output
